task.summary: Default task
tabs to spaces fix

add mc import line
clean up code
ignore .idea folder update sbtvInfo based on new folder structure added debug into sbtvInfo added sbtvKeyMaker generated new sbtvKey.txt
fix seq name split with multiple underscores generate new sbtvKey.txt with correct seq names
remove debug test
update shell command to run maya_initialize
header with docstring footer with credits

creates userSetup.py if not exists edits userSetup.py creates Maya.env if not exists edits Maya.env with sbtvtools locations and keeps existing paths edits userPlugins.mel for vray plugin currently set to dev on which points to the jj_dev folder
feedback for running shell command
clean maya_initialize code add .idea/ folder to .gitignore
docstrings add clean code
add credits
clean formatting of code add Jib Jab header and footer add docstrings to all functions
replace mc. with cmds. to be consistent with all code
refactor publish call to match publishTools refactor

publish function defaults to using current loaded file publish defaults to not saving current file error catching for files is specific on file permissions and folder exists update lightingTools shelf pub
publish check if current file is saved
print out export to heads up display and to script editor

update shelf pointing to lightingTools
make eye lights for new light setup shelf update todo for maya_initialize
clean up output to print start and end frame
print out if no playbackOptions found

ingest mayaAscii files to remove RenderMan or Turtle renderers.

add self back into statements
